synopsis.native: Juan, un sin techo que malvive vendiendo dibujos a turistas, decide abandonar su rutina de alcohol y violencia en las calles de Barcelona y emprender un viaje sobrehumano hacia un destino que solo él conoce.
synopsis.english: Joan is a homeless man who survives selling little wire figures. One day, he decides to quit the streets of Barcelona and his routine of alcohol and violence, and take on a journey the destination of which only he knows.
